name: Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited
description: Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited is a leading manufacturer of electrical and electronic enclosures, specializing in the production of high-quality products for a variety of industries. Founded in 1917, the company has built a reputation for its commitment to quality, innovation, and customer service. Hammond's extensive product line includes enclosures for electronic components, racks for servers, and various accessories that enhance the functionality and safety of electrical installations. With a strong focus on engineering and design, Hammond has continually evolved its product offerings to meet the changing needs of its customers. The company operates several manufacturing facilities in North America and Europe, allowing it to efficiently serve a global market. Hammond is dedicated to sustainable manufacturing practices and continually seeks to reduce its environmental footprint through energy-efficient processes and recyclable materials. The company prides itself on its ability to provide customized solutions tailored to specific customer requirements, ensuring that they meet both industry standards and individual needs. As technology advances, Hammond remains at the forefront of innovation, integrating new materials and designs to enhance product performance and usability. Their mission is to deliver reliable, high-performance products that empower their customers in their respective industries, while fostering long-term partnerships built on trust and integrity.

seo.meta_title: Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited | Electrical Enclosures and Racks
seo.meta_description: Explore Hammond Manufacturing, a leader in electrical and electronic enclosures. Discover our extensive range of high-quality products and customer-focused solutions.

faq.question: What does Hammond Manufacturing specialize in?
faq.answer: Hammond Manufacturing specializes in the manufacture of electrical and electronic enclosures and racks.

faq.question: Where is Hammond Manufacturing headquartered?
faq.answer: Hammond Manufacturing is headquartered in Guelph, Ontario, Canada.

faq.question: What are some of the product categories offered by Hammond?
faq.answer: Hammond offers enclosures, racks, and various accessories for electrical installations.
